VISTEON CORP., Dearborn, Mich., which makes automotive products, has formed a joint venture with Nichirin Co. to make air-conditioning hoses and also agreed to buy a 10 percent stake in Nichirin in the future.

TEREX CORP., Westport, Conn., a maker of cranes and dump trucks, said it had completed the sale of its truck-mounted forklift businesses to the Cargotec unit of Partek Oyj , Helsinki, Finland, which makes load-handling equipment, for about $144 million in cash.
SCHERING-PLOUGH CORP., Kenilworth, N.J., the maker of the allergy drug, Claritin, said it won a United States patent that could hold off generic competition for its Nasonex allergy spray until 2017.
